DOC.brief_title: Preference Methotrexate ( MTX ) Pre-filled Syringe Versus Pre-filled Pen Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA )
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Age 18 75 year Rheumatoid arthritis accord American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criterion 1987 ACR/European Liga Against Rheumatology ( EULAR ) 2010 Disease activity score ( DAS ) 28 > 2.6 Main Prior current subcutaneous treatment selfinjection Prior concomitant treatment biologics Contraindications MTX treatment History diagnosis dermatological disease injection site Women childbearing potential use highly effective method contraception men partner childbearing potential use contraception study least 6 month thereafter .
